tooltips.loaf-to-round: If you're baking a loaf recipe in a round pan, the cake will need about 10 to 15 min less in the oven.
tooltips.round-to-loaf: A loaf needs longer in the oven than a round cake - you should bake it for about an hour and check regularly.
tooltips.square: Square cakes typically are thinner than round cakes or loaf cakes - bake them for at least 15 min less and check regularly.

guides.butter: Butter can be replaced with oil, but you need to reduce the amount to 80 percent.
guides.fresh yeast: Replace with one-third the amount of dry yeast, either instant yeast or active dry yeast. Follow the package instructions to see if the yeast must be proofed before use.
guides.active dry yeast: Dry yeast can be replaced with three times the amount of fresh yeast.
guides.baking soda: Baking soda can be replaced with baking powder. You should use about 1 â…“ of the specified amount.
guides.buttermilk: Thin the yogurt out with a few tablespoons of milk. Alternatively, you can curdle milk with a bit of lemon juice and use that as a replacement.
